theImmortal:FlameSling.NAME: Flame Sling
theImmortal:FlameSling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theimmortal:Ignite and 1 Vulnerable. NL theimmortal:Burst: Draw 2 cards.

theImmortal:Scorch.NAME: Scorch
theImmortal:Scorch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL theimmortal:Burst: Deal !D! damage.

theImmortal:Blitz.NAME: Blitz
theImmortal:Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw !M! card.
